name: Sticky for SiteOrigin
author: mimothemes

sections.description:
This plugin creates a options panel inside siteOrigin Widgets called ‘Sticky’, using it’s options you can stick widgets inside theirs rows. Made using the great Jquery Plugin Sticky Kit

Visit the Jquery plugin site here Sticky Kit
sections.installation:
1. Upload sticky-siteorigin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload sticky-siteorigin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Can i use this plugin without SiteOrigin Page Builder Plugin

No.
